name: Hide 'n' Can't See
description:
A little girl is left home alone, with only her monkey teddy bear by her side.

The monkey suggested to play Hide and Seek with her, she agreed

Instructions:

Find the monkey  hiding in the darkness before the time runs out.

Turn off your light to see and be able to pick up the monkey.

Please note that the monkey can teleport to the same place few times in a row

If that happens step away from the monkey and then walk into it again

Controls:

WASD  or Arrows - Movement

SPACE - Turn on / off flashlight

ENTER  - interact with the dialog

Pick up monkeys by running into them
